description: Try our easy to follow Summer Sausage Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salad,Sausage,High protein,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Tomato,Low sugar,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Summer Sausage Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cobb corn, blanched for 2 minutes, kernels removed
400g tomato medley mix, sliced into rounds
3 tbs olive oil (1 tbs for cooking, 2 tbs for dressing)
1 cup frozen baby peas, blanched, refreshed

recipeInstructions.text: Place couscous in a large heatproof bowl. Stir in 1 cup boiling water. Cover with plastic wrap. Set aside for 5 minutes or until liquid has absorbed. Fluff couscous with a fork and set aside.

Heat oil in a large non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat. Add sausages and cook turning for 1 minute. Cover with a lid and cook for further 2 minutes, shaking pan as necessary. Uncover and cook, turning until cooked through. Stand in pan for 10 minutes.
Meanwhile, combine dressing ingredients in a screw top jar, shake until combined.

Thickly slice sausages. Place in a large bowl. Add peas, sugar snap peas, corn kernels, tomato, onion and couscous. Pour over dressing. Stir to combine. Arrange on a serving plate, crumble over feta. Tip 1: Swap lamb sausages with chicken or beef. Tip 2: Sausages can also be cooked on the barbecue and served to the side of the salad. Tip 3: The couscous can be made the day before.
